plot: Though it sounds incredible, little Ulises with only nine years old, from one day to another grows an enourmous mustache. This situation, appearing to be ordinary, starts a series of extraordinary events for him, his mother and his best friends. From this moment onward with the company of a bunch of very curious characters they will have to face this hairy adventure.
title: Ulises Y Los 10,000 Bigotes
plot_es: Though it sounds incredible, little Ulises with only nine years old, from one day to another grows an enourmous mustache.
